explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques, specifically LS-SVM and SVM, for stock selection and portfolio optimization.
explanations.supervised learning: The use of SVM and LS-SVM implies supervised learning, as these models require labeled data for training.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions the use of support vector machines (SVM) and least-square support vector machines (LS-SVM) for stock selection.
explanations.SVM: The paper explicitly mentions the use of support vector machines (SVM) and least-square support vector machines (LS-SVM) for stock selection.
